summary: A former NCAA champion wrestler, paroled after ten years in prison, agrees to a series of cage fights to save a friend's life and is asked to do the impossible - lose.
cast: Wes Chatham|Devon Sawa|Sarah Butler|Neal McDonough|Lucky Johnson|Chris Browning|Adam Mervis|Bernard Hocke|Ava Bogle|Eric Scott Woods|Michael Jai White|Andrew Sensenig|Rich Clementi|Kasey Emas|Kris Van Damme|Marco St. John|J.D. title: El chico de Filadelfia
